item.title: Immigration enforcement surge begins in Charlotte, North Carolina
item.description: Federal officials confirmed a surge of immigration enforcement in North Carolina's largest city has begun.

item.title: MAGA rift grows as Trump feuds with Marjorie Taylor Greene before key 2026 midterm elections
item.description: President Donald Trump has called it quits with one of his most stalwart MAGA-world supporters, calling Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene "'Wacky' M...

item.title: Trump buys at least $82 million in bonds since late August, financial disclosures show
item.description: Trump bought at least $82 million in corporate and municipal bonds from late August to early October, financial disclosures made public on Saturday sh...

item.title: Former Fed Gov. Adriana Kugler violated trading rules while at central bank: ethics report
item.description: The Federal Reserve's internal watchdog was notified earlier this year about stock trades from 2024 disclosed by then-Gov Adriana Kugler.

item.title: Trump says he will likely sue the BBC for up to $5 billion over edited speech
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday he would likely sue the BBC next week for as much as $5 billion.
